name: S.O.S
description: Embark on a frantic race against time onboard a rapidly deteriorating spaceship! With whatever you can scavenge from items flying through space, save your ship from exploding as well as keep up the crew's happiness. Will you place more thrusters on your new ship or more fuel to give you more time to build your own escape pod? Perhaps add ice cream machines and cats just to keep the crew happy? Play alone or in a "Hot-seat" styled mode to enhance your experience!
